message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a price that I think is very reasonable, considering its value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I understand that you were thinking of $100, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $125. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'll offer it to you for $128, which is still a good deal considering its value to you. This is my final offer.
I understand that this is your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you reconsider?
I appreciate the negotiation, but I've decided to sell the product to someone else who is willing to pay a lower price. I'll sell it to John for $80.
